Sales Inventory Git

Welcome to my Sales Inventory Project

Java, Big O Analysis, Merge Sort, Comparator. . .

During quarantine break, I had got a big idea making my own song collections with file printing album by album and songs in it. Now I started it with some first steps with making an inventory storing thee different classification: Fruit, Vegetable and Preserve. Take input for specific classes, sort based on item codes, print to file and read data from file. ðŸ¤©

I am still on the way changing it with adding expiry date with First in First out method for every products for real-life alike system.
